data.title: Japan International Consultants for Transportation Co., Ltd.
data.meta_description: Company overview Access Number of Qualified Employees History ​ Trade name Japan International Consultants for Transportation Co., Ltd.（JIC） Head Office
data.meta_site_name: Japan International Consultants for Transportation Co., Ltd.
data.text:
November 2011Established under the sponsorship of 7 leading railway companies(*1) in Japan

(*1) East Japan Railway Company, Tokyo Metro Co., Ltd., West Japan Railway Company, TOKYU CORPORATION, Kyushu Railway Company, Japan Freight Railway Company and Keihan Holdings Co., Ltd.

April 2012Overseas railway consulting business was transferred from JAPAN RAILWAY TECHNICAL SERVICE (JARTS) and overseas division was transferred from JR East Consultants Company. Full-scale operations began with additional investment from other three railway companies(*2).

(*2) SEIBU RAILWAY Co., Ltd., Keio Corporation., Osaka Metro Co. Ltd

June 2013Awarded JICA’s Project on improvement of service and safety of railway in MyanmarDecember 2013Awarded and contracted for JICA’s Joint Feasibility Study for Mumbai – Ahmedabad High Speed Railway CorridorDecember 2013Awarded and contracted for JICA’s “Jakarta-Bandung High-Speed Railway project (Phase I)”August 2015Contracted for and launched Myanmar State Railways’ railway-related grant aid projectApril 2016Awarded and contracted for Operation and Maintenance Consulting Service (OMCS) for Project of Jakarta MRT System Phase 1December 2016Awarded and contracted for “General Consultancy of The Mumbai – Ahmedabad High Speed Railway Project”October 2017Awarded for the Consultation Service with regard to the India High Speed Railway Project: Training Institute (slab track and lodging)April 2018Established subsidiary JIC Transportation India Private Limited in the Republic of IndiaJune 2018Completed replacing old interlocking systems installed at Yangon Central Station and Puzundaung Station, Myanmar to start using electronic interlocking systemsMarch 2019Completed Operation and Maintenance Consulting Service (OMCS) for Project of Jakarta MRT System Phase 1November 2020Awarded and contracted for Operation and Maintenance Consulting Services 2nd Stage (OMCS2) for Jakarta Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) projectJuly 2021Won 4th Japan Construction International Award for Jakarta Mass Rapid Transit System （North-South Line） Project (Phase 1)November 2021Obtained “Eruboshi certification” under the Act on Promotion of Women’s Participation and Advancement in the WorkplaceJune 2022Awarded and contracted for Design Related Advisory Services for the Construction Stage of Mumbai-Ahmedabad High Speed Rail（MAHSR）Project
